plantable.description: This attribute declares the item as plantable.

crop.description: The id of the crop that will be planted.

consumable.description: This attribute declares the item as a consumable.

food.description: This attribute declares the item as food.

stamina.description: The amount of stamina the item will restore.

eatingSeconds.description: The amount of time it takes to eat the item.

drops.description: An array of items that will drop when the item is eaten.

sellable.description: This attribute declares the item as sellable.

value.description: How many coins the item is worth.

purchasable.description: This attribute declares the item as purchasable.

value.description: How many coins the item costs.

maximum.description: The maximum number of this item that can be purchased daily.

harvestDrop.description: This attribute declares the item as a harvest drop.

quality.description: The percentage chance of the crop being each quality.

1.description: The percentage chance of the crop being tier 1

2.description: The percentage chance of the crop being silver quality.

3.description: The percentage chance of the crop being gold quality.

4.description: The percentage chance of the crop being iridium quality.

foragable.description: Declares the item to spawn as a foragable

spawnWeight.description: Relative spawn weight of the foragable compared to others.

type.description: Type of forable, plant or bug.
